app.title: Azure AI Foundry Management Panel
app.subtitle: Maintain a master model list at the top, then select available models for each account/region by clicking. Automatically generate account-level and global model lists (with commas after each model name for easy copy-paste).
app.description: Maintain a master model list at the top, then select available models for each account/region by clicking. Automatically generate account-level and global model lists (with commas after each model name for easy copy-paste).

masterModels.title: Global Model Directory
masterModels.description: Maintain all possible models here once (separated by commas, spaces, or newlines). Models for accounts/regions below are selected by clicking, no need to re-enter.
masterModels.placeholder: e.g.: gpt-4o, gpt-4o-mini, gpt-4.1, gpt-35-turbo, o1-mini ...

coverage.regionCoverageDesc: Percentage of global directory covered by each region
coverage.modelCoverageDesc: Number of regions each model is enabled in
coverage.noRegionsOrEmptyMaster: No regions or empty master list, cannot calculate coverage.
coverage.noModelsOrNoMatch: No models or no matching models for current filter.

accounts.title: Azure Account Configuration
accounts.description: Add regions for each account and select available models by clicking. All configurations are stored in browser localStorage.
accounts.notePlaceholder: e.g.: Tenant ID, Subscription ID, etc.
accounts.searchPlaceholder: Filter by model keyword, e.g.: gpt-4o

regions.noRegions: No regions yet. Click "Add Region" to start.
regions.configureMasterFirst: Please configure "Global Model Directory" at the top first.
regions.noMatchingModels: No matching models for current search.
regions.pasteEmpty: Clipboard is empty or has no valid models

models.title: Model Overview
models.showingCount: Showing {{showing}} models ({{total}} total). Use search and status filter above to locate.
models.emptyMaster: No models. Please configure models in Global Model Directory first.
models.noMatch: No matching models for current filter. Adjust search or status filter.

deleteAccount.title: Delete Account
deleteAccount.description: Are you sure you want to delete this account? This action cannot be undone. All regions under this account will also be deleted.

deleteRegion.title: Delete Region
deleteRegion.description: Are you sure you want to delete this region? This action cannot be undone.

export.securityDescription: The exported config file contains sensitive information (API Keys). Please keep it safe and do not share with others.

toast.copyFailed: Copy failed, please select text manually

statistics.noAccounts: No accounts yet. Please add an account.

modelStatistics.title: Model Statistics
modelStatistics.noModels: No models yet. Please configure models in Global Model Directory first.
